author: lsanjuan
title: The new prom princess
text:
The new prom princess   
Prom dressing has come a long way from floor-length petticoats, huge ruffles and that strategically pinned corsage. Visit SM Store’s Fashion Forum for stylish and cool alternatives to be the belle of the ball. 
Golden goddess Nothing says “glam” more than a short, metallic dress. Slip into heels and you’re ready to party. ADVERTISEMENT 
Girly goth Goth doesn’t have to be all grungy; it, too, can be elegant. Dark lipstick with a beaded LBD is so dramatic. Keep your eye makeup light for a sweet and clean look. 
Pink perfect Planning to dance the night away? Do it in a flowy silhouette. Easy to move in and manage, this relaxed style leaves you free to be yourself. 
Sneak peek For prom, sneakers are the new stilettos. You’ll be surprised at how well they actually go with gowns. Red high-cuts, Converse 
Styling Luis Carlo San Juan Makeup Chuchie Ledesma for Maybeline Hairstyle Moriel Flores
